bibl.title: Alexandria as a Centre of Greek Philosophy in Later Classical Antiquity.
Studies in Honor of Miroslav Marcovich
bibl.author: BLUMENTHAL, H.J.

bibl.note: The philosophical tradition in Alexandria may lay claim to have been at least equal to that of Athens itself.
BLUMENTHAL H.J., Alexandria as a Centre of Greek Philosophy in Later Classical Antiquity.
Studies in Honor of Miroslav Marcovich = ICS 18 (1993) pp. 307-325.
